_header: Far in sea by west Spain
_description: The Land of Cokaygne — ninety-five couplets

BLHar913.First Lines:
Fur in sea bi west spaygneIs alond ihote
                    cokayne…
BLHar913.Last Lines: …Prey we god so mote hit beAmen pur seint charite
